message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with improving the spatial codification for semantic segmentation, which is a problem in computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes novel approaches for object description, which involves machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a likely sub-category as well. The paper also mentions state-of-the-art techniques, indicating that it involves some form of machine learning or statistical analysis, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a possible sub-category. The paper also mentions visual descriptors, which involves multimedia processing, making cs.MM (Multimedia) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with image context and object contour, which involves information retrieval and image processing, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible sub-category.
